name: deviantP0LLS v7 (rotane)
description:
This style makes all poll bars around dA slim and grey.

Page on deviantART: http://fav.me/d67dkia

user.name: rotane
user.about: I like to write userstyles. Some of them i upload here, the majority of which are for deviantART.com

additional_info:
Version history:
v1.0.0 (June 1, 2013) Public release.
v1.0.1 (June 1, 2013) Small fix for polls in MC.
v1.1.0 (June 1, 2013) Support for donation pools and pageview stats.
v1.1.1 (June 15, 2013) Better fallback for non-gecko browsers; 100% result fix.
v1.1.2 (August 23, 2013) 100% result fix again.
v1.1.3 (September 24, 2013) sub-20% and 100% results fix in MC.
v1.1.4 (June 24, 2014) Removed Mozilla-specific values.
v1.1.5 (June 24, 2014) A few more cross-browser fixes.
